# depthConfidenceMap

**Instance Property**

Depth confidence map associated with the `depthDataMap` if available. Pixel format is `kCVPixelFormatType_OneComponent8`.

## Declaration

```swift
var depthConfidenceMap: CVPixelBuffer? { get }
```
title: depthConfidenceMap
